Posts.Content: Bernadette,I took those shots after each treatment and yes it made me hurt also.The doctor gave me percoset for pain.If your pain gets worse ask the doctor for something,you dont have to suffer with pain...Tammy

Posts.Title: Faith in God

Posts.Content:
Hi Bernadette,I had my gallbladder out a few months ago.The ultrasound didnt show problems with my gallbladder but i kept having pain so they did a Hiatus scan and that showed my Gallbladder not working .It turned out that i had 15 gallstones.So if the ultrasound shows nothing and your still having pain,ask for a Hiatus scan. Merry Christmas, Tammy 
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: Questions on heart problems after chemo

Posts.Content:
Welcome Holley,this is the best bunch of ladies.They helped me so much as i was going through my breast cancer journey.And they still help whenever i need them.You will be in my prayers,stay possitive that is so important.Also get a journal and write in it when you feel like it.It really helps.I was so scared to get my first chemo treatment but it wasnt that bad.Keep in contact with the ladies here they are like my Angels, and we all know what you are going through.God Bless, Tammy
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: 41 & Scared

Posts.Content:
I was on Tamoxifan and my onc. switched me to Arimidex about
 a month ago and i am gaining weight fast.Have any of you noticed weight gain with Arimidex?? Tammy
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: Arimidex,weight gain??????

Posts.Content:
I had a mastectomy on the left side(possitive lymph node)and they kept telling me that i was at high risk for cancer in the right side.I didnt want to take that chance so i had them remove the right breast,I had chemo and after all was over i decided not to have reconstruction.One good thing about
 it is i dont have to wear a bra if i dont want to.The doctor told me there was a chance that they wont get all the cancer with a lumpectomy and that made my mind up!It could still recure with a mastectomy but i felt good about
 my decision.Go with what you feel inside,Listen to your Gut feeling.Pray and leave it in Gods Hands. Tammy
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: decision making time, I could use your input

Posts.Content:
you have made the perfect choice because you made it.I was thinking about
 getting reconstruction with a free tummy tuck but i have been through so much i decided not too right now.But if i decide to do it that would be my choice of reconstruction.Do you have a journal?if not you should get you one,it really helped me.On days i didnt want to write anything i would just say(this sucks)or (I hate this)or whatever you feel inside.My husband would tell me that i was the strongest person he knew and that i was "Tough as nails" we have to stay strong and possitive but sometimes thats hard to do and its ok to break down and cry that doesnt mean that were weak it means were human.Ask God to carry you through this journey and he will.Your in my prayers! When you get through this journey,you will be stronger than before you started!!  STAY STRONG AND POSSITIVE.  Tammy 
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!

Hi Ladies,I just need to talk to someone about
 this.A Cat Scan i recently had showed a 3-4 millimeter(small)Lung Nodule.Doctor said he will check it again in1 year but i dont feel comfortable with that.He said it is small right now,but if it is part of the breast cancer i had then they should do something while it is small.I just feel very confused right now.What would you do?? Tammy

DR. Susan Love was on Fox 40 news and what she said was very upsetting.Im sorry,I shouldnt have repeated what she said.We were talking about
 Elizabeth Edwards and i just thought about
 what DR. Love said on the news when she was answering questions about
 MRS. Edwards 
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: Elizabeth Edwards has mets

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,Last night on the news,Dr.Susan Love said everyone with Breast cancer will eventually Die from it.This really made me scared so we need to just put our trust in God and know that he will take care of us. We are a bunch of fighters on here so it will take more than Breast Cancer to get the best of us!!   Tammy 
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: Elizabeth Edwards has mets

Posts.Content:
I found the news cast online and I listened better to what she said.What she said was someone with Breast Cancer Matastisis eventually dies from it.Im so sorry for even posting on this.Please forgive me.I am a survivor also and hearing this is upsetting.  Im very sorry.   Tammy 
 GOD WILL NOT GIVE US MORE THAN WE CAN HANDLE!!!!!
Posts.Title: Elizabeth Edwards has mets

Posts.Content: Bernadette,have you ever had a PH Study Test?I am having one done on Feb.9,they want to measure the acid.I guess they put this little micro chip in my asophagus for 24 Hrs. Tammy P.S. its good to hear from you!

Posts.Content: Laure,I had a mastectomy a year ago.The Oncoligist told me he just does an exam.And for me to do self exams.There should be some kind of scan they could do for us. Tammy

ion for pain meds just in case.My legs hurt me so bad,thank goodness its temporary. Tammy

Posts.Content:
Hi JoAnn,I have a new email address that i need to update.It is 
      Tammy
Posts.Title: I sent out a test email to all who are on the.........

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies i had my Gallbladder removed recently and i had 15 Gallstones,and a kinked cystic duct.I was having bad stomach aches and finally found out this is what it was.I told the nurse "I am hollow from all the surgeries"and she said "you still have your Appendix" I told her to find some wood quick and knock on it! Tammy
Posts.Title: 15 GALLSTONES

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,It has been a year since chemo,Double Mastectomy,Ovaries removed,Bladder repair and 2 weeks ago my Gallbladder removed(15 Gallstones)and now Barrets Osophagus.Will i ever be normal again.It seems like since i had chemo,my body has gone Haywire.While i was going through chemo,surgeries,I pushed my feelings behind me and stayed strong and i saw a movie tonight about
 a lady with breast cancer,chemo.And my feelings started to surface it seems for the first time.Tears started down my face and i told myself not to cry,but i realized that i need to cry and face everything ive gone through.I thank God, and you ladies for being there for me through this long Journey. Thanks for listening, Tammy
Posts.Title: I just need to talk

Posts.Content:
now the surgeon is saying he wants me to have a Hiatal scan(wed)to see if my Gallbladder is working right.about
 the nodule on my lung he said i will have another Cat scan in 3 months.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Gallbladder,nodule on lung

Posts.Content:
I remember when you were thinking about
 doing this and now look at you, your doing it.I am so proud of you.You are showing that a survivor means life goes on and dont let nothing stand in your way of your dreams,from your proud survivor friend.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Application submitted

Posts.Content: OH Bernadette I am so sorry to hear this.We are all here for you.Stay strong and possitive.Were with you all the way. Love,Prayers and Hugs Tammy
Posts.Title: Bernadette, any news?

Posts.Content: Christa,you took the words right out of my mouth,well said.These ladies took care of me also,thank you ladies.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Huge Hugs To All

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,I had a endoscopic test and it showed Barretts asophigus(spelling ?)there is a high risk for cancer to go to the asophigus.I think this started when i had chemo last year,lots of acid reflux.It could cause this problem.Have any of you ever heard of this before? Tammy
Posts.Title: Barretts asophigus

Posts.Content: Jule and Jpann,I too had Ductal Carcinoma 2 cent.Mass.1 possitive lymph node,chemo,left breast removed and had right breast removed by choice.Ovaries removed and now having gallbladder removed because of gallstones,all of this in 1 year.Its very scary to find out you have Breast cancer but stay strong and allways possitive fight this darn disease with all your mite,never give up!The ladies on this forum has helped me so much through my journey.I asked God to carry me through this journey and he did and he will carry you too.Your both in my prayers,  Tammy
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed 10-1-06

Posts.Content: Welcome Leah,my name is Tammy and im 44 years old its been a year now since my last chemo treatment,I was stage 2,possitive lymph nodes,double mastectomy and i had hair to my knees,i loved my hair and i was scared at the thought of chemo but after the first treatment you will know what to expect and it wont be so scary for you.My hair grows so fast now and its thick and wavy,it used to be so straight.I love short hair now and i will keep it short.Your hair will grow back quickly after chemo.What is your cocktail going to be(chemo meds).The ladies on this forum is so helpful and they will be your best friend .someone will be responding to you soon.Pray to God to carry you through this journey,he carried me and he will carry you to.Stay possitive!Keep in touch with us we will help you through this battle. Prayers and hugs.....Tammy

AgeInfo.Phrase: name is Tammy and im 44 years old its been a

Posts.Title: Chemo and Hair ( New to site)

Posts.Content: Hi Girls,I hope this was my last surgery.They say now i have Barrets Asophigas,acid reflux has done a lot of damage and it is precancerous.I have to have endoscopic (scope) often and biopsies to see if any cancer cells start to form.I had a lot of acid reflux during chemo and i think that is what did the damage. Tammy
Posts.Title: 15 GALLSTONES

Posts.Content: I had 6nodes out on left arm and 2 from right arm can i still get lymphadema with such few nodes out?  Tammy
Posts.Title: Lymphadema

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,I was having alot of stomach aches so i had a cat scan and the surgeon called and said i have Gallstones and i need my Gallbladder removed so i ask for the report and it doesnt say anything about
 gallstones and my family Doctor doesnt know what the surgeon is talking about
.What do you think about
 this?also he said i have a small solid nodule on my left lung,thats the side where i had breast cancer,but he told me not to worry about
 this nodule that97%of these are nothing but what if im one in the 3%.Friday i have a colonoscopy and the test down the throat,surgeon said chemo can cause problems in some of our organs.I just neede to talk to someone about
 all this,thank you for listening.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Gallbladder,nodule on lung

Posts.Content:
Well i had the colonoscopy and endoscopy(throat)I have a medium size Hiatal Hernia,3 Biopsys done.I had no pollups.So now i have surgery on Dec.1 to have gallbladder removed(Gallstones)Keep me in your prayers(Strength).Oh by the way for those of you thinking about
 a colonoscopy,the worst part was the preparation,drinking the liquid stuff,i was a sleep and didnt feel anything.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Gallbladder,nodule on lung

Posts.Content: Kat,im glad you asked that question because i was wanting to know what mets were also.  Tammy
Posts.Title: I have a stupid question

Posts.Content: I think we all need a group hug,We have all gone through so much and it is so awsome to come to this forum and see so much encouragement.I love all of you! Cathi my prayers are with you and there are alot of possitive thoughts coming your way. God Bless, Tammy
Posts.Title: Venting...A very mean disease...

Posts.Content: Your mom will be in a beautiful place and have no more pain,your in my prayers.   Tammy
Posts.Title: I'm losing her fast and it hurts

Posts.Content:
I cant even put into words how i feel right now.This darn disease is terrible and not fair.The one comforting thing about
 it is she knew jesus and now she is in heaven with him and she has no more pain.She is an Angel. Sending prayers to her family and friends,  Tammy
Posts.Title: Another loss....

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,i have to have an EGD test with the tube down my throat this sounds scarry to me.I have had bad stomach aches for about
 2 months now and i pray that its nothing to do with my recent breast cancer.Have any of you had this test and how was it?  Tammy
Posts.Title: EGD Scope Test

Posts.Content: Jo-Anne,good idea. Please pray for my finances my husband is not working right now because of back problems and its all on me to pay the bills right now and my job is very physical and i get tired but i have to keep working for the benefits.God has carried me through my terrible journey and i know he is not going to leave me now,God is Awsome. Tammy
Posts.Title: Power Prayer Sunday

Posts.Content: Michelle,thats a very cute story.Thanks for sharing it.Happy Mothers Day to all!  Tammy

Posts.Content:
Mia,  i am on tamoxifan also and i have alot of memory loss and forgetfulness.I didnt know if it was from the chemo or tamox.Has your doctor said anything about
 this..Possitive
Posts.Title: Any help available for menopausal symptoms?

Posts.Content: Bernadette,did they put you to sleep to do this test?  Tammy
Posts.Title: EGD Scope Test

Posts.Content: Bernadette,Look to God through this journey and he will carry you and give you strength.Your in my prayers,   Tammy
Posts.Title: CT results not good

Posts.Content:
Hi Eve,Welcome.My name is Tammy and i had a double mastectomy.I had left breast removed 1 year ago and the doctor said i was at high risk for cancer going to the right one so i told them to take that one to in Aug.I had chemo and recently had ovaries removed and bladder repair.Im on Tamoxifan and im doing fine.I chose not to have reconstruction and im happy with my decision,you can get prostesis in any size you want.Im having hot flashes and im hot all the time so i never wear the prostesis,you get used to it.Someone on this forum said they was hot while driving and they took their Boobs off and through them in the backseat.Its so good when you can laugh about
 certain things and i laughed at that.  Keep us posted,God Bless,   Tammy
Posts.Title: new here facing 2 mastectomy

Posts.Content: Hi Deb,I have a lump on right side under my ribcage.Dont you think i should ask for a pet scan? Tammy
Posts.Title: Pet Scan

Posts.Content: Bernadette,your in my prayers.Stay possitive and keep your faith. Tammy
Posts.Title: Need the pink feather brigade

Posts.Content:
Good morning Ladies,Thank you so much for sharing your stories.All of us need to hear survivor stories,it sure made my day.Deb the story about
 your grandma is Touching,Bless her little heart.Thank You all,    Tammy
Posts.Title: I need to hear some possitive survival stories

Posts.Content: You Go Girl !!!!!!! im celebrating with you.  Tammy
Posts.Title: It was 10 years ago today

Posts.Content: Pam,I am also Her2possitive and im on Tamoxifan and had my ovaries removed.Dont give up!you have to fight this.Its hard to stay possitive right now but once everything settles down keep a possitive mind and pray that God will carry you through this journey,There is a light at the end of the tunnel.  Your in my Prayers,   Tammy
Posts.Title: HER2 Positive

Posts.Content: Julie,I have been on tamoxifan for 8 months now.And i just had ovaries removed 4 weeks ago.And the onc. said i have done everything that i could to keep it from coming back.After my 5 years are done,I think i will want to take extra precaution and continue to take medicine.How was Tamoxifan for you?so far its ok for me.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Arimidex vs. Femara?

Posts.Content: I want to thank all of you sweet Ladies for helping me through my journey.I remember when i was going through chemo and i couldnt sleep i would be on this site at all hours of the night,and it helped me just to know that someone was on the other end listening to me.I guess i will always be on a journey but you helped me through the worst part of it.I dont post much now but i still come to this site everyday and i will always be connected to healingwell and all of you. To all the new ladies,you are in good hands here.THANK YOU>>>>GOD BLESS YOU,    Tammy
Posts.Title: Thank You,my Breast friends!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,I had my ovaries removed 3 weeks ago and i was told that i would go into immediate menopause,I already had hot flashes from Tamoxifan but i havent noticed any difference yet with my ovaries out.Has anyone of you had your ovaries removed and what was your expierence with it?  Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries

Posts.Content:
Laure,if the doctor suggest you have them removed,you will feel alot better just knowing that you did one more thing to keep this darn disease away.I havent noticed any difference with menopause by having them out.I hope you have them out because i know you will feel better just knowing that the hormones wont be produced from there anymore.Someone was saying that hormones also come from fat cells,i was going to talk to my onco.about
 this.I will let you know if i feel any changes(menopause). Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries

Posts.Content: Chantry,I had left breast removed march.8 and the doctor said i was at high risk for it going into the right breast ,so i told them to take it off so the right one was removed August 2005.I chose not to have reconstruction and im glad i made that choice.The Drains were not to bad for me,i only had them in for a week.Think possitive and pray to God to help you through this journey and he will comfort and guide you. Tammy
Posts.Title: one order of double mast...coming up

Posts.Content: Hi Junie My name is Tammy and im on Tamoxifan.I started gaining so much weight and my doctor put me on a diet pill 1 time aday ADIPEX-P and i have lost 20 pounds in 6 weeks.This pill curbs your appetite,I stopped eating sweets and bread.And i dont get a speedy feeling like some diet meds do.  Tammy
Posts.Title: weight loss after tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: bernadette,your in my prayers.Ask God to carry you through this journey.....Tammy
Posts.Title: My latest update!

Posts.Content: Im on Tamoxifan, i have no side effects.The doctor said now that i had my ovaries removed then i could go on Arimadex but if it makes your body hurt then i think i will stay on tamoxifan.The doctor did say that Arimadex is better than Tamoxifan. Tammy
Posts.Title: Arimidex vs aromison medicine

Posts.Content: Eve,I was also put into menopause by chemo and alot of hot flashes and i thought when i got my ovaries out that it would be worse but i dont notice any difference,I guess i was allready used to it.  Tammy
Posts.Title: new here facing 2 mastectomy

Posts.Content: Pam,I had 1 node possitive and 5 negative also.My tumor was 2cm and im a stage IIA it sounds like were diagnosed almost the same.I had left breast removed aug.8 2005 and they said i was at high risk for cancer to go into right breast so i had them remove right one on march.10 2005.Im ER possitive,and just recently had my ovaries removed to help stop the flow of hormones and im on Tamoxifan.I chose no reconstruction and i have prostesis.Get lots of rest and keep in touch.  God Bless,  Tammy
Posts.Title: I'm home

Posts.Content: Laure,The surgery for ovaries was they went through my belly button,a small incision on let abdomen and incision below my belly button.(laproscopic) I also had my bladder repaired so my recovery time is longer,but for ovaries alone its less recovery time.I was glad to have them removed because now the onc.has told me that i have done everything i could do to help from not getting a recurrence,anything to keep those hormones away. Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries

Posts.Content:
Congratulations Babyseester,you said something about
 chemo and brain cells.I finished chemo 8 months ago and i have not been the same since,my mind is so forgetfull and different.I dont know if its damage from the chemo,Tamoxifan,Zoloft.Are you still bothered by forgetfulness etc.?  Tammy
Posts.Title: One year anniversary

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,I am going to ask my onc. for a pet scan.What does the Test involve?  Tammy
Posts.Title: Pet Scan

Posts.Content: Ill be there with my pink prostesis tightened down and proud. Tammy
Posts.Title: Tomorrow's the day...

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies for all the pink feathers there were alot of sneezes going on.Im home and doing well.The doctor said the menopause will get worse now that the ovaries are out,so its like im just waiting for those furious hot flashes she said i would get.I already have hot flashes i cant imagine it getting any worse.I will keep you posted.  Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the feathers on friday

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,its been 8 months since my chemo treatments,and my mind starts to wonder sometimes.my tumor was 2cm with 1 node possitive.Can someone share their journey with me.I just have been thinking about
 that 1 node possitive and micro invasion,i have alot of faith in god that the chemo got everything.  Tammy
Posts.Title: I need to hear some possitive survival stories

Posts.Content: stefanie,those are encouraging stories,Thank you for sharing them with me. Tammy
Posts.Title: I need to hear some possitive survival stories

Posts.Content: Laure,they did fill my stomach with air but if they didnt tell me ,I wouldnt have known it because i didnt have any problems with it.You will do fine.God will be there with you. Thank you Frayda for the info. Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries

Posts.Content:
Im 44 years old and i had a hysterectomy 23 years ago because of a prolapsed uterus and im ER possitive,I see the gynocologist friday about
 getting the ovaries as my onc.thinks this would be best.I will keep you posted. Tammy

AgeInfo.Phrase: <Z> <Z> <Z> <Z> Im 44 years old and i had

Posts.Title: ovaries removed

Posts.Content: Ladies get the boas out and gas up the pink mobile.I need your thoughts on friday.Im having ovaries  removed and bladder and the whole bottom repaired.The doctor said i wont be able to sit for awhile.  Thank you my friends,   Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the feathers on friday

Posts.Content: Hi Chloe,I am a 11A because 1 of the lymph nodes were possitive.with you not having possitive nodes is probably why your 11. Tammy
Posts.Title: CONFUSED

Posts.Content: Thank you for all your responses,with the bladder surgery and ovaries the doctor said no lifting for 3 months and my job said if im not released to full duty by may.30 i will go on a rehire list,i have been with this same job for 10 years and i am so stressed that i wont be able to get doctor to release me to full duty early.So i might cancel the bladder surgery and just do the ovaries.My bladder is a grade 3 and the worst is a grade 4.Im going to ask the doctor if i can wait a couple of years to have it repaired.Also what are some of your experience with having the ovaries removed.I heard that it puts you in immediate menopause.   Tammy

AgeInfo.Phrase: to full duty by may 30 i will go on a

Posts.Title: Ovaries coming out march.10

Posts.Content:
chantry,i have had a double mastectomy and i have prostesis,the good thing about
 this is you can choose in the summer when its hot not to wear them, or they have really cute bathing suits you can wear with the prostesis.   Tammy
Posts.Title: Update...

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,im having my ovaries out(hormones)march.10,and my bladder repaired.Have any of you had this done and if so when were you able to lift things again.My job is physical(lifting)   Tammy
Posts.Title: Ovaries coming out march.10

Posts.Content: these women have helped me so much,when i was sick it was comforting to know that they were there for me to talk to.i feel like i have known them forever.I want to thank healingwell and these women for being ther for me.....Tammy
Posts.Title: You Gals are AMAZING!!

Posts.Content:
Joyce,I had the same thing happen to me about
 the bald head and to use soap or shampoo,I think the chemo brain started settin in.You have to have humor through all this,how about
 your eyebrows did you have a hard time keepin both of them on?I get hot and i wipe my face in the store and when i get home i only have one eyebrow on.HA HA i just crack up laughing....Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: Good idea i will try that,Thank You...Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content:
Im on tamoxifan now for about
 2 weeks,im hoping i dont gain anymore weight...Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: Bernadette,its ok to vent your feelings anytime.We cant hold it inside of us,we need to let it out and everyone on this panel knows what your going through.Pray that God will carry you while your going through this journey.I did,and i told him not to put me down yet because im not done with my surgeries yet.God is so great,just hold on to him.  Love   Tammy
Posts.Title: Feeling down

Posts.Content: Bern,I lost weight with the first half of treatment i think becayse i didnt feel to good and then when i started Taxol i wanted to eat everything,I felt good just had aches and pain...Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: You Ladies are great! thank you.I will keep you posted. Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the feathers on friday

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,my onc. says its a good idea to have my ovaries taken out,does that mean that if they take my ovaries then no harmones can enter my body?does anyone know about
 this?   Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries removed

Posts.Content:
Daisybud,you can order a catalog at 
 its from the cancer society.theres good stuff and good prices too. Tammy
Posts.Title: Mastectomy

Posts.Content: thank you for the information,are there any lifting restrictions and for how long? Tammy
Posts.Title: ovaries removed

Posts.Content: Bless You,thanks for sharing. Tammy
Posts.Title: Statistics

Posts.Content: I started counting on the day that i started tamoxifan... Tammy
Posts.Title: When to count from

Posts.Content: Ladies i just need to vent to someone who has walked in my shoes,so here it goes!I was diagnosed in feb.5005,had left breast removed march.8 started chemo april.4,ended chemo july.27,had surgery to remove right breast aug.8 went back to work(physicle job)oct.3.Im now having surgery march.10 to have ovaries removed and bladder repaired.Im feeling overwhelmed and in a daze.I know some of you are going through the same thing,and thats why i love all of you so much because i allways feel better after talking to you because you know what im going through..Thank You for listening     Tammy
Posts.Title: I need to vent

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much for your encouragement.My grandaughter was born today so i am very happy right now,her name is Ellie Dae. Thank you and i will post more often. Tammy
Posts.Title: I need to vent

Posts.Content:
Thank you,she is beautiful.Being around her makes me forget about
 everything else.Congratulations joyce on your new grandbaby. Tammy
Posts.Title: Congrats Grandma Tammy

Posts.Content: I started taking Tamoxifan 3 months ago,im having hot flashes and weight gain other than that I feel pretty good.....Tammy
Posts.Title: Arimidex and Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: we have to put our trust in our doctors and God that they will give us the best treatment to help us through our journey.Alternative treatment takes awhile to work if it even does work,when i was diagnosed i was scared but then i wanted to hurry and get the chemo so it would kill the cancer cells.Mageezy i hope you never have to make that decision for yourself....Tammy
Posts.Title: Handling the "What if's"

Posts.Content:
I have pain in my right side also, the doctor thought it was gallstones and i had acat scan and ultrasound and everything looked ok.except the radiologist couldnt explain why there were lymph nodes show up on cat scan on my right side.The onc. isnt to worried about
 it he said everyone has lymph nodes.I would like to know why i have pain on my side,its very painful.I dont know what else the doctors can do...Tammy
Posts.Title: went to PCP

Posts.Content: SHAVE IT SHAVE IT SHAVE IT SHAVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: Katt,I used baby lotion and it smells so good and keeps your head moisterized.My hair is starting to come back in now but i still put baby lotion on to keep it soft and smelling so good.....Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: I lost my eyebrows and eyelashes after the fourth treatment,as soon as i started taxol they were gone....Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content: Bern,I had 4 taxol treatments and the first one my lashes and brows started thinning.The Taxol made my bones hurt really bad.And i gained all the weight back that i had lost.I didnt feel as sick with taxol but i hurt...Tammy
Posts.Title: Hair loss

Posts.Content:
I asked my doctor about
 this and he said chemo doesnt effect the brain,i dont believe him because i have put the icecream in the cabinet also...Tammy
Posts.Title: chemo brain

Posts.Content: Bernadette,God will not give you more than you can handle and this is just another obstacle to climb over.Ask god to carry you through this journey and to prepare you for whatever comes your way.I will be praying for you...Tammy
Posts.Title: Need some extra prayers from my breast buddies

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,I start tamoxifan tomorrow and the onc.told me two big side effects were weight gain and hot flashes.What are some of your experiences with this ?Im scared and cautious,it feels like im getting ready for my first chemo treatment....Tammy
Posts.Title: I start tamoxifan tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi Skeeter,so effexor is good for hot flashes?i will remember that.If the hot flashes get to bad i will ask for effexor.The onc.told me yesterday that the two main side effects are weight gain and hot flashes....Tammy
Posts.Title: I start tamoxifan tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi Mary,did you gain any weight? Tammy
Posts.Title: I start tamoxifan tomorrow

Posts.Content: I was interviewed yesterday for my breast cancer journey and there are going to be actors acting out my story.It will be at the opera house,Dedicated to me.All donations will be donated to cancer society(breast cancer)...Tammy
Posts.Title: Pink Ribbon Time!

Posts.Content: I started tamoxifan 1 month ago and i have blonde hair on my face also,does it go away or am i stuck with it...Tammy
Posts.Title: Clutter Alert

Posts.Content: Hi Deb,Ihad 6 lymph nodes out on left arm and 2 out on right,could i still get lymphodema with that small amount of nodes out? Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: Good morning ladies,is it possible to still have chemo brain 3months after chemo,because i cant remember alot of things and im really forgetfull.Do you ever get normal again?.....Tammy
Posts.Title: chemo brain

Posts.Content: I work at a school and i havnt been to work in 6 months and the kids and teachers were so glad to see me.My hair is only 1 inch long and before chemo i had hair to my knees.The kids want me to keep my hair short...Tammy
Posts.Title: short hair

Posts.Content: At work when i do to much I get sharp pains where i had the mastectomy,is this normal.Its been 7 weeks for right mastectomy and7 months for left side...Tammy
Posts.Title: first week back at work

Posts.Content: Lucy,how soon after chemo did you start having heart problems?I finished my chemo in july and what symptons should i look for if it effected my heart...Tammy
Posts.Title: Update and Thanks

Posts.Content: Good morning Ladies,have any of you gotten face hair after going through chemo?I took steroids but only 3 days after each treatment i dont know if the steroids caused it but im getting alot of blonde face hair,just glad its not dark....Tammy
Posts.Title: facial hair

Posts.Content:
Welcome Carol,I just finished chemo in july and im doing fine and back at work.I know chemo sounds scary,and all of the side effects you see on your paper,you wont have all of those.I never vomited or got really sick,just tired.There are good meds that the doctor can give you to help with just about
 any side effect you might have.There are alot of very nice and caring ladies here for you to talk to,so keep us posted we will help you through this.remember GOD will not give you more than you can handle....God bless....Tammy
Posts.Title: Newbie to BC, and this board

Posts.Content: Carol,when i found out that i had BC i prayed to God and ask him to carry me through this journey and he did,He took away my tears and gave me joy.And after being off work for 6 months i was afraid to go back,but as i was driving to work on that first day back i ask god to keep carrying me and not put me down since he did such a good job helping me through everything.Keep the faith and put it in gods hands.You have an awsome Daughter to help you through this,let her cheer you up.My daughter was awsome she helped me so much...Tammy
Posts.Title: Newbie to BC, and this board

Posts.Content:
Kitty, my doctor says chemo has no effect on the heart and brain and I had adriamycin.Please let us know what the results are.Your results could 
open a whole new can of worms for doctors to think about
....Tammy
Posts.Title: Update and Thanks

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone for your replies.Can i start counting towards my five years now? Tammy
Posts.Title: I start tamoxifan tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hello,i got the report from one of my mastectomy`s.The surgeon said everything looked good but one part says"The lymph node does contain a rare multinucleate cell (possible megakaryocyte).Levels obtained on block A6".Can someone interpet this for me.The doctor said they didnt find anything,so why does it say this in the report,Does it mean anything? Tammy
Posts.Title: Pathology report question

Posts.Content:
Well my onc. said no restrictions on lifting and so did the surgeon.I get this wierd feeling that they dont know what their talking about
 because everyone i talk to says to be very careful for lympadema.I had muscles and nerves cut and i still have numbness and burning under my arm.I go back to work monday and im so nervous about
 the heavy lifting.Skeeter good luck to you on monday for your first day back to work....Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content:
Hi Ladies,i just heard back from my surgeon and she said i have no restrictions on lifting heavy items.This doesnt sound right because i had 6 lymph nodes taken out.Im waiting to hear from the onc.about
 his opinion...Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: skeeter,be proud of your short hair.I am so proud of mine i use baby shampoo and baby lotion on it,Its so soft and easy to manage.I colored my hair for years and i always said that i wished i had natural hair with no coloring ever applied and my wish came true.(High price to pay for healthy hair)Alot of women wished they could have healthy hair like ours,so be proud and show off your beautiful short hair....Tammy
Posts.Title: short hair

Posts.Content:
Bernadette,ask your doctor for prevacid.It helps for acid reflux and heartburn,it was a lifesaver for me.Take water and a muffin or snack with you.I allways felt hungry while i was getting my treatment.Thats good that you got bandanas,thats all i wear and even they get hot.Do you have a stool softener,Collace is a good one.Ill be thinking about
 you tomorrow when im getting my surgery....Hugs,Tammy
Posts.Title: First chemo

Posts.Content:
Good morning Ladies,after being off work for 6 months I went back to work and made it through the whole week,I got tired and my legs hurt.My surgeon and onc.said no lifting restrictions and i started lifting but my chest started to hurt(mastectomy)and i have to lift heavy things.So i went to my family doctor to get his opinion and he got mad because the other doctors said no restrictions,so he put me on light duty.So if your going back to work and Doc says no restrictions,you should question him about
 that....Tammy
Posts.Title: first week back at work

Posts.Content: good morning Ladies,this is my second week back at work and im feeling a little stronger,I still get real tired and my legs hurt but not as much.With this tomoxifan i get those awful hot flashes but i thank god that im getting stronger everyday...Tammy
Posts.Title: first week back at work

Posts.Content: count me in,im bringing all the pink feathers that i collected from my last two surgerys.Lots of prayers MK...Tammy
Posts.Title: Prayers for MK

Posts.Content: After having a double mastectomy and chemo,Being off work for six months im going back to work in a week.Im a school custodian with some heavy lifting and physical work.Im around alot of sick kids,do you think my immune system is strong now?Im so afraid i wont be able to do this type of work anymore.Have any of you gone back to work after mastectomies and was able to lift heavy things ok?Are there dissability laws for cancer survivors if they cant do their normal work?....Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: Hi Deb,Ihad 6 lymph nodes out on left arm and 2 out on right,could i still get lymphodema with that small amount of nodes out? Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,my surgery is over and everything went well,im not lopsided anymore.Im as flat as a board,i think i lost 10 pounds by having a mastectomy.Thank you all for being there with me.I never saw so much pink in all my life.I collected enough feathers to make me a pillow....love Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the pink feathers tommorow ladies

Posts.Content: Kathy,Did you have lymph nodes taken out? Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content:
My onc. doesnt seem worried about
 me lifting.Im kinda worried about
 that...Tammy
Posts.Title: Going back to work

Posts.Content: Thank You,that makes me feel better....Tammy
Posts.Title: Pathology report question

Posts.Content: Kathy, does the five years start when you finish chemo or when you start tamoxifan?I start tamoxifan on july 27 and i was wondering when i could start counting my five years. Tammy
Posts.Title: starting Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Laure,thanks for the encouragement,i need it right now. Tammy
Posts.Title: Double Mastectomy(ultra sound or mammogram)

Posts.Content: Oh my gosh Debbie i dont know what to say,i cant even talk right now.This poem says it all Thank you for sharing it with us...Tammy
Posts.Title: A Gift

Posts.Content:
I know i allready posted but this poem really touched me.I havent been able to cry but im crying now.Thank You God for carrying me through my journey and giving me strength and 
opening my eyes to see how precious life is(AMEN) OH and thank you for using debbie for touching our hearts with this poem...Tammy
Posts.Title: A Gift

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,tomorrow i have the right breast removed,already had left removed.now i wont be lopsided.I would love to see some pink feathers floating around in the room....Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the pink feathers tommorow ladies

Posts.Content: Thank You so much for everyones replies..Tammy
Posts.Title: restless legs

Posts.Content: Hi everybody,i finished my last chemo last wed,and i still have numbness in my fingers and toes.The doctor said it could be permanent we will have to wait and see.Have any of you got permanent nerve damage from chemo? Tammy
Posts.Title: numbness in fingers and toes

Posts.Content: Cathy do you have any side effects with the neurontin.The doctor said if the numbness doesnt go away he will put me on neurontin. Tammy
Posts.Title: numbness in fingers and toes

Posts.Content:
Candy,you are not alone in this you have alot of people who care about
 you .I will be there with you tomorrow to decorate the room in pink feathers HUGS, Tammy
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Hi Donna,Welcome.I havent had a recurrence but i just had a mastectomy and chemo.Your in the right place for support the women here are great so stay here and someone with your experience will get back to you. Hugs, Tammy
Posts.Title: Recurrence less than a year after first diagnosis

Posts.Content: Beth the itching could be a reaction to the shot.I had the same shots and they told me if i have itching or a rash to contact them right away.You might want to let them know. Tammy
Posts.Title: numbness in fingers and toes

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,Im having my right breast removed on thursday Aug.18.Left one was removed in march.I was wondering ,how do they check for masses and lumps if you have no breasts?Oh and i finished chemo treatments two weeks ago(so happy) Tammy
Posts.Title: Double Mastectomy(ultra sound or mammogram)

Posts.Content: michelle,i just had my second taxol treatment,and my first was 6 hrs.The joint pain is sometimes unbearable so the dr. gave me percoset pain pills for the hard times,you dont have to suffer pain they have alot of meds that will help you.Ask your doctor for pain meds to get you through the painfull days. Love Tammy
Posts.Title: ? re:pain and taxol

Posts.Content: Hi,i finished chemo july.27 and my finger tips and toes are numb doctor said it could be permanent.And i constantly have to move my legs at night when i try to sleep,has anyone had this as a lasting effect after finishing chemo treatments?if so what did you do to make your legs feel better.And also i start tamoxifan next week what are your expierences with this medicine....Tammy
Posts.Title: restless legs

Posts.Content: Laure,im sending a big hug to you and lots of prayers..Tammy
Posts.Title: prayer request in NJ again

Posts.Content: Thank You so much everybody your all special to me...Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the pink feathers tommorow ladies

Posts.Content:
When i had my surgery the doctor asked me if i had anyone with me and i said" oh ya"their all over this room,youll be seeing pink pretty soon!She thought they gave me to much medicine,and i explained to her about
 all of you and the pink feathers,then she laughed and realized i was not crazy after all....Tammy
Posts.Title: I need the pink feathers tommorow ladies

Posts.Content: Its been two weeks since my last chemo treatment and i have fuzz on my head and it looks grey.I had a little grey before chemo but this looks all grey.Oh well thank goodness for NICE AND EASY(coloring)Do you know how soon i can color my hair? Tammy
Posts.Title: On a lighter note.....

Posts.Content: Thank you for the information.So if the numbness goes away can it come back later(nerve damage) Tammy
Posts.Title: numbness in fingers and toes

Posts.Content:
Bernadette,you might want to get some bandanas and scarves.Ithought i would want a wig but i never wore one.I ended up wearing scarves and bandanas,and going bald at home.Before chemo i had hair to my knees and when it started to fall out on my second treatment i shaved it.One good thing about
 not having hair is it doesnt take very long getting ready in the morning. Hugs, Tammy
Posts.Title: treatment plan

Posts.Content: Kathy it sounds like so much fun,and so nice that you spent time with your family My family doesnt get together anymore.If we did a few of them would probably argue and mess the whole event up.My dream is for my whole family to get together and have a good time,so hearing that you had a nice time makes me happy.Thank You for sharing with us.  Love Tammy
Posts.Title: Back home

Posts.Content:
Lauri,I would love to have a family like you have.my family used to get together but no more.My sister is an alcoholic and starts trouble every time.Its sad because my family needs to realize that we need each other.By me getting breast cancer it made me look at life differently.i dont worry about
 the small things anymore because this journey that im on is making me stronger.i have two treatments left and im so happy.When i  miss my family i just pray about
 it and God fills that empty spot in my heart.Sorry to tell you my problems but i guess i needed to vent. God Bless,Tammy
Posts.Title: Back home

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,i have two treatments left and i was wondering if it took some of you awhile to feel normal again.I am a lead custodian in a school (physical work)Im having my right breast removed next month(my choice)already had left removed.I dont know if i can go back to my type of work or not.Have any of you gone back to lifting heavy things and felt ok?I only had 6 lymph nodes removed so i dont know if it will effect my arm or not.Can you give me some advise? Thank You, Tammy
Posts.Title: is there lasting effects after chemo

Posts.Content: Bernadette,I was on adriamycin and cytoxin the first two months of treatment and i lost 15 pounds and felt yucky.and the next two months i was on taxol and gained my weight back and had a good appetite.My bones hurt really bad but they have meds for that.I started losing my hair the day of the second treatment(2 weeks)Get you some bandanas and scarves,i thought i would wear a wig but i dont i just wear scarves.After the first treatment then you will know what to expect.I read that you have surgery on wed.im having surgery on thursday,ill be thinking of you.Hugs and Prayers.....Tammy
Posts.Title: Getting my port a cath

Posts.Content: OOPS!!!! I meant to put this on  the "first chemo treatment" page. It must be that chemo brain kickin in.  Tammy
Posts.Title: Cycles

Posts.Content: Good morning,I was so scared for my first treatment too.I felt like i was going to be poisened,and i wrote to these nice ladies on this site and one of them told me when i get chemo treatments just to think of  the little pacman(game)scooping up all the cancer cells in my body and it worked every time i thought of that i laughed and pictured the little pacman going to town on those nasty cells.anything that helps you through your journey grab onto it and dont let go.You can do this,I have one treatment left and with prayer and a possitive mind im making it through this.Hugs....Tammy
Posts.Title: Cycles

Posts.Content: This is the first time i have mouth sores with chemo.I use a special mouth wash but its not working for me now and i have a painful lump(sore)in my mouth.Im calling the doctor tomorrow but i was wandering what some of you have used for this.Thank You,Tammy
Posts.Title: Mouth Soars"HELP"

Posts.Content: Julie i pray that everthing is all clear and thank you thank you for your possitive words as im going through my journey now. Love Tammy
Posts.Title: Onc. appointment tomorrow....

Posts.Content: Welcome Judy,my name is tammy and i was diagnosed with the exact thing as you.One node involved and i had a masectomy on the left side on march.8 im taking chemo every 2 weeks.The doctor said if thats to hard than i can go to every 3 weeks.My hair started falling out in 2 weeks after my first treatment.after chemo is done im going to have the right breast removed by my choice.Im not having reconstruction,i have a prostesis and it looks so natural.Im satisfied with it.You found a good place to get information everyone here cares so much about each other. Tammy
Posts.Title: dose dense chemo

Posts.Content: Judy,i have 8 treatments but i have 5 more to go,and i dont have to inject myself they do it every two weeks. Hugs Tammy
Posts.Title: dose dense chemo

Posts.Content: I fully agree stay in the hospital as long as you can.I had a masectomy in march and they were going to send me home the same night and i said no way and im glad i did because i started having breathing problems and they were able to help me.the next day i felt better so you need those extra days in the hospital so they can monitor you for awhile. Love Tammy
Posts.Title: Oncotype DX study back in - yippeeeee!

Posts.Content: Hi ladies,the chemo is causing my mouth and tongue to be very sore,have any of you had this and if so what did you do for it? Tammy
Posts.Title: sore mouth

Posts.Content: Ladies, the doctor is making a big deal out of the first taxol treatment i will be getting ,they have to watch me for six hours afterwards.Did you have any bad side effects after the first one? Tammy
Posts.Title: Has anyone used taxol

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,Im almost done with the first round of chemo and for the second round they are giving me taxol and this will have different side effects.When i get that first treatment of taxol they said they have to watch me for 6 hours.Have any of you got some advice.Thank You  Tammy
Posts.Title: Has anyone used taxol

Posts.Content: Randy,i just had my 4th chemo treatment.The doctor said by the fourth one your usually wiped out(tired).They give me a steroid and zofran for nauses for three days after treatment but that wasnt enough so i take ativan and it helps with nauses also.i cant eat spicy foods .I take zantac 150 twice a day for reflux.Have lots of scarves on hand,their my best friend right now. Good luck to you,Hugs Tammy
Posts.Title: Your Experience with Chemo

Posts.Content: Oh Cindy im so sorry,your in my prayers.Wasthis a recurrence from breast cancer? Im going through chemo now .would like to hear from you. Lots of prayers,Tammy
Posts.Title: PET Scan results

Posts.Content: Hi ladies,I lost my hair two days ago and i dont know what to use .Do i use shampoo and lotion or does it take something special? Also after chemo i have decided to have my other breast removed on right side that would be both gone,But i was wandering if their not supposed to use the arm that had lymph nodes removed for blood draws or etc.for those of you that had both breast removed did they go ahead and use those arms and did you have any trouble with it afterwards?  Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: what do i use on a bald head

Posts.Content: Ladies, my stomache hurts really bad,i dont know if i need to go to the bathroom more or if it is from my shot i got on tuesday for white blood cells.has any of you experienced this after chemo or a shot? Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: bad stomach ache

Posts.Content: lauri,congratulations can you fill us new ones in on the type of cancer you had so are road wont look so long ahead of us.Its so encouraging to hear this from you.a lot of things go through our minds neg.and pos. but when we hear great news like this it helps us to focus better and stay possitive.Thank you so much for sharing this good news with us,you made my day! Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: A day to celebrate.....m

Posts.Content: Judy,im going on my fourth chemo treatment and im having more nauses now than with the other treatments.I take zofran and steroids for three days after each treatment but that wasnt enough so im taking ativan for nauses as well but that makes you tired.Im a lead custodian and i do alot of physical work and i work at a school around alot of sick kids(cleaning up after them daily)so im not working until my treatments are over.Also you feel different each day you never know if your going to feel like working,as for me i coudnt do it.Keep us posted Love Tammy
Posts.Title: dose dense chemo

Posts.Content: Mia.you are beautiful.you have a great husband,i see alot of love between you too.Thanks for sharing with us. tammy
Posts.Title: Check out the site my DH created

Posts.Content: Hi ladies,i called the nurse and she said the meds im taking will make my face red.But if i get a fever with it to call right away.the chemo meds and steroids are causing it.Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: red face after chemo?

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much for the information.also the doctor said by my fourth treatment that i will be really tired.what was your experience with this. Thank you Tammy
Posts.Title: what do i use on a bald head

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for all your replies,im feeling pretty yucky right now,but knowing i have caring friends like you really helps.Thank you  Tammy
Posts.Title: what do i use on a bald head

Posts.Content: Hi ladies,Ihad a masectomy two weeks ago,and for some reason i am afraid of having chemo.i feel like im going to be poisined.i live my life trying to stay healthy,and doing right for this to happen.its not fair.I know all of you feel the same way.I guess reallity is finaly hitting me.I go next week to the oncoligist to see what he is going to do.Thank you for letting me cry on your shoulder.I like talking to you because you have been through it ...love tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: afraid of chemo

Posts.Content: Hi janis,I had a masectomy 3 weeks ago and i didnt wear a bra they gave me a tube top wrap to protect the area and i still wear it ,i took a button up top ,its easier to put on after surgery.are you having lumpectomy or masectomy? Tammy( possitive)

Posts.Title: Hi and welcome Possitive...

Posts.Content: I agree with you cindy i think masectomy is the way to go also.My surgeon said if i had lumectomy that they might have to do it again,so i chose masectomy and im doing fine(3weeks ago) Tammy(possitive)

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,my first chemo is tomorrow(scared)i would love to see some floating pink feathers and just knowing your their with me.Did any of you feel sick immediately after your treatment or did it take awhile(trying to prepare myself)  Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: pink feathers please

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,well i made it through my first chemo treatment,and so far i feel allright.I go tomorrow for a shot for the white blood cells.Hopefully i can go through this without getting sick(pray)before i left the doctors i scooped up all the pink feathers and now i have a Boa. Thank you ,my angels Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: pink feathers please

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for all your replies it really made me feel better to know its normal to feel this way and its comforting to know that all of you will be there with me.I will catch as many floating pink feathers that i can...Love Tammy(possitive)

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies,i start my chemo treatments on monday.twice a week for 16 weeks.I was very nervous today for my consultation but i thought of all of you and it really helps to know that your right there with me.Thank you all so much. Love Tammy(possitive)

Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies i had my first chemo treatment yesterday,and i woke up this morning with a bright red face thermometer says no fever.Is this normal? have any of you expierenced this? Love Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: red face after chemo?

Posts.Content: Hi ladies.i read all your replies,and you really do show so much love for everyone its great.can you explain the boas and pink flamingos,and do you really go to the hospital with ladies or are you there in love and spirit,just curious.i love all of you keep up all the love and good advice..Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: Nancyjo, did I read you are having surgery today?

Posts.Content: Hi laure,my name is tammy(possitive)i have been getting mammos faithfully every year amonth ago they found a solid mass so i had a biopsy and ultrasound.it was possitive for cancer.they said it has been growing for over 2 years.i had a massectomy on left breast last week,im doing fine ,just got the results back from lymph nodes,one was possitive so im going to have chemo.Honey it is scary but you have to stay possitive.pray  and ask god to help you through this.if you find yourself worrying just say  JESUS he will help you.The ladies on this board are my angels.keep in contact with us ,you have good friends here..Love  Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: Having core biopsy on Friday - very scared

Posts.Content: nancyjo,i decided to have a masectomy because my surgeon told me with a lumpectomy she might not get it all so i said take it off.later im going to get reconstruction.with the muscle from my stomach(you get a free tummy tuck  yay!)I love all of these ladies on this sight your my angels,keep up all the good advice..Tammy(possitive)
Posts.Title: Just found out

Posts.Content: Hi Ladies, im home now the surgery went well.i will know the results from the lymph nodes on tuesday.Thank you everyone for your prayers and kind words,your my angels.i am so glad i found you.i will keep you posted....Love  Tammy(positive)
Posts.Title: Hi and welcome Possitive...

Posts.Content: Tammy,43 years old diagnosed feb.2005 with infiltrating ductal carcinoma.Had left breast removed march.8 and having right breast removed aug.18 2005 (my choice)because of high risk.I live in calif.  My last chemo treatment is july.27 2005 then Tamoxifan.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share

Age.Phrase: name is Tammy and im 44 years old its been a

PatientDecided.Sample: Laure,The surgery for ovaries was they went through my belly button,a small incision on let abdomen and incision below my belly button.(laproscopic) I also had my bladder repaired so my recovery time is longer,but for ovaries alone its less recovery time.I was glad to have them removed because now the onc.has told me that i have done everything i could do to help from not getting a recurrence,anything to keep those hormones away....
